title: Portfolio Tools
errorMsgSavePortfolio: An error occurred saving portfolio data.

name: Name
portfolioTypedescInternal: This portfolio should only be used as a test in Production; the portfolio has no access to TFFA options.
portfolioTypedescExternal: Use this portfolio for external reseller, acquirer, or merchant portfolio purposes. If approved, the portfolio can be enabled for TFFA use.
processorDesc: Select one or more processors and complete the appropriate settings. Select "Skip Processor" if no processors apply.
portfolioProdDesc: Select which products you want to enable for this portfolio.
noResult2: Use the filters to search again.
noResult2Eval: Use the filters in the search toolbar to search for an account by name or ID.

errorTextField: Field must contain a maximum of 6 numbers.
errorMsgTextfield: Mastercard/Acquirer/Destination BINs must contain a maximum of 6 numbers.
emptyPaymentDeviceDistribution: Payment acceptance and device distribution partner can't be null or empty with card present product.
bothToCpCnp: Card acceptance type can't be modified from Both to Card Present or Card Not Present.
cpToCnp: Card acceptance type can't be modified from Card Present to Card Not Present.
cnpToCp: Card acceptance type can't be modified from Card Not Present to Card Present.
toolTipCardAcceptanceType: Skip processor won't let you transact.

confirmSecurityProductDisable: This will disable risk rules for the products you have deselected. Are you sure you want to continue?
